mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(C_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS C_DATE, COUNT(ID) AS SOLVED FROM CODE WHERE ID = #{id} GROUP BY C_DATE ORDER BY C_DATE ASC

WITH DATE_COUNT AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(C_DATE, 'MM-DD') AS C_DATE, COUNT(ID) AS SOLVED FROM CODE WHERE ID = #{id} AND TO_CHAR(C_DATE, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(C_DATE, 'MM-DD') ) SELECT C_DATE, SUM(SOLVED) AS SOLVED FROM DATE_COUNT GROUP BY C_DATE ORDER BY C_DATE ASC
